SEARCH
Package fidelity

Class PointCard

java.lang.Object
fidelity.FidelityCard
fidelity.PointCard
public class PointCard extends FidelityCard
Class representing a PointCard, which is a type of FidelityCard. This card allows the owner to earn points based on their spending, and provides a discount on the next order if enough points are accumulated.
Author:
Aymane Adib

  • Method Details

    • addMoneySpent

      public void addMoneySpent(double amount)
      Adds the specified amount to the total money spent. Calculates points based on the money spent and checks if a discount is available for the next order.
      Parameters:
      amount - the amount to add to money spent

    • getPoints

      public int getPoints()
      Returns the number of points accumulated on the card.
      Returns:
      the number of points

    • getMoneySpent

      public double getMoneySpent()
      Returns the total money spent by the owner of the card.
      Returns:
      the total money spent

    • isNextOrderDiscount

      public boolean isNextOrderDiscount()
      Returns whether the next order is eligible for a discount.
      Returns:
      true if the next order is eligible for a discount, false otherwise

    • setNextOrderDiscount

      public void setNextOrderDiscount(boolean nextOrderDiscount)
      Sets the eligibility for the next order discount.
      Parameters:
      nextOrderDiscount - true if the next order is eligible for a discount, false otherwise

    • getFinalPrice

      public double getFinalPrice(Order order)
      Calculates the final price for the given order using the PointCard. The final price is the original order price minus any reductions.
      Specified by:
      getFinalPrice in class FidelityCard
      Parameters:
      order - the order for which the final price is calculated
      Returns:
      the final price after applying any reductions
